about_the_game:
Up to 8 players can compete in a range of poop-themed modes, from free-for-all poop-making mayhem to team-based toilet destruction.

  • Toilet Tussle: Want to poop? Find the best time and place to do it, or take the flying chairs and musical instruments that would scream when they bang on you

  • Last Man Standing: Forget about the pals; slap the sh** out of everyone who stands in your way.

  • Dodgeball: Dodge, duck, and dive—just hope those buddy seagulls don't drop any surprises on you!

  • Toilet Defense: Will you be able to save the school restroom, or will it be flushed into chaos

  • Capture the Pal: Protect your pal and keep him safe from the bear’s claws

In Poopy Pals, customization is key to standing out! Players can:

  • Adjust their character's body type, going from fat to skinny.

  • Choose skin tones to make their character truly unique.

  • Add a wide range of hats and accessories, from funky to ridiculous, to make your character even more memorable

The weapons in Poopy Pals are equally as outlandish as the game itself:

  • Music instruments (like guitars, drums, and more) are used for both offense and play.

  • Cleaning equipment (mops, rakes, etc.) for some slapstick-style combat.

  • Furniture (chairs, tables, etc.) can be wielded as makeshift weapons or obstacles in your way.

The characters in Poopy Pals are fully animated with ragdoll physics. This means they have exaggerated, jiggly, and unpredictable movements that add to the slapstick humor of the game. Expect to see players stumbling, falling, and flailing around in the most ridiculous ways possible.

Poopy Pals is perfect for anyone looking for a fun, lighthearted game with plenty of silly moments. Whether you’re outsmarting the opposing team or just trying to "poop" faster than everyone else, you’re in for a good time with friends. Ready for some ridiculous fun? Grab your swimming trunks, customize your character, and dive into the mayhem!

Tip of the day: Stay away from the principal. He has the big hands.
